reviewText: A hot stud on a fast motorcycle with a helmet rigged by a villain to extort the cyclist to do his bidding.  Flakey girl puts on the helmet and both are stuck as the helmet is rigged to explode without a set time.  Fast and furious chase scenes, but vapid acting from leads who do more sexy posing than acting.  Entertaining in the vein of cashing in on hot pop stars of the moment.  Hollywood does the same.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This film is awesome. Wait till you find out who the bad guy really is in this movie. The action sequences chases are incredible to watch.

reviewText: I have loved this movie ever since I first watched it. Lee Min Ki is one of my favorite actors. Lee Min Ki is hilarious in this movie and the female Gang Ye-Won is definitely up there with him. This is the first movie I saw with Gang Ye-Won and I'm glad I did. Give this movie a shot. At the end of the movie you get to see behind the scenes with the actors doing stunts as well as the stunt doubles. This gives you a view into the danger of doing stunts for films too.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Quick isn't going to be fielding any surprises your way, but it works. It tells the story of a top-notch motorcycle courier and a jilted ex-fling who get trapped as pawns by a voice over a telephone forcing them to deliver bombs all over the city while the police are trying to both track them down and the mastermind they suspect to be behind it.It's of course fully predictable, but is full of comedy which is done decently enough to keep it entertaining. The chase sequences are ludicriously over the top, as is most of the acting, but it never becomes cringe-worthy. Overall, it remains enjoyable as a thoroughly light hearted movie.The only trouble might be in that being so light and fast-paced, the jokes might not stand up well to repeated viewings, and the chases are ludicrous, but not entirely spectacular to watch over and over again. But it's certainly a fun little movie, and if you're looking for something a bit mindless that's not overly violent and keeps things light and comedic, Quick works.
Title: N/A

reviewText: South Korea has produced some of my favorite films - and QUICK is no exception.  If you turn down watching some of these films, even this one, due to subtitles or the film being foreign, you're seriously missing out.  'Quick' in particular is so much fun, a pure adrenaline ride that will also make you laugh; it's the perfect blend of action, mixed with comedy in all the right places.Han Gi-soo is a former motorcycle gang member who now works as a bike messenger on his BMW bike, who one day delivers a small package to an office ... and, moments later, barely escapes with his life when that very office is blown to bits via a bomb.  It never occurs to Han that the bomb was in the very package he delivered, but when he takes a last-minute job to pick up a female Korean pop music star, rushing her to meet with corporate sponsors, not only does Han realize the young gal is his former girlfriend ... but the girl, insisting upon wearing the one and only helmet Han has for safety, puts it on and triggers a bomb that will go off the moment the helmet is removed.What follows is a sadistic madman who phones Han, letting him know that the helmet and several bombs have been placed on Han's motorcycle - and that if Han doesn't follow all instructions, given only 30 minutes each to deliver each of the packages (bombs) to where the bad guy directs him, the helmet will blow up.What follows are some outrageously awesome bike rides/stunts, as the cops quickly identify Han as the bomber and begin hunting him down.  But more than just a 'Speed' off-shoot, this film has so much more; between the action, the tension of the ticking clock plot element, the emotional baggage left over from Han and the girl who at one time loved him, and even the perfectly-placed humor (one of the cops chasing Han has been in love with Han's ex-girlfriend for years - and still is, so he gets on a personal vendetta to save her), the film is tons of fun ... all leading up to a great final chase scene, and a film that will make you laugh even as the adrenaline starts pumping.  A perfect summer popcorn flick, full of action and comedy and even a touch of romance.
summary: Shut off your brain, this one's all about the action and comedy ... and it WORKS BEAUTIFULLY
Title: N/A
